content:
DataBindingCollection Class

In this Article

Provides a collection of DataBinding objects for an ASP.NET server control. This class cannot be inherited.

Syntax

Declaration

public sealed class DataBindingCollection : System.Collections.ICollection

Inheritance Hierarchy

  • System.Object
  • DataBindingCollection

Inherited Members

Equals(Object)
,
Equals(Object,Object)
,
GetHashCode()
,
GetType()
,
MemberwiseClone()
,
ReferenceEquals(Object,Object)
,
ToString()

Remarks

This collection is a dictionary containing all the DataBinding objects on an ASP.NET server control. You can access the objects contained in this collection through the Control class implementation of the IDataBindingsAccessor interface. Any DataBinding or DataBindingCollection objects associated with a server control exist only at design time. They do not exist at run time and, therefore, are not accessible during run time.

Constructors summary

DataBindingCollection()

Initializes a new instance of the DataBindingCollection class.

Properties summary

Count

Gets the number of DataBinding objects in the DataBindingCollection object.
IsReadOnly

Gets a value indicating whether the DataBindingCollection collection is read-only.
IsSynchronized

Gets a value indicating whether the DataBindingCollection collection is synchronized (thread safe).
Item(String)

Gets the DataBinding object with the specified property name.
RemovedBindings

Gets an array of the names of the DataBinding objects removed from the collection.
SyncRoot

Gets an object that can be used to synchronize access to the DataBindingCollection collection.

Methods summary

Add(DataBinding)

Adds the specified DataBinding object to the DataBindingCollection collection.
Clear()

Removes all DataBinding objects from the DataBindingCollection collection.
Contains(String)

Determines whether the data-binding collection contains a specific DataBinding object.
CopyTo(Array,Int32)

Copies the DataBindingCollection values to a one-dimensional Array, beginning at the Array object's specified index.
GetEnumerator()

Returns an enumerator to iterate through the DataBindingCollection object.
Remove(String)

Removes the DataBinding object associated with the specified property name from the DataBindingCollection collection and adds it to the stem.Web.UI.DataBindingCollection.RemovedBindings* collection.
Remove(DataBinding)

Removes the specified DataBinding object from the DataBindingCollection collection and adds it to the stem.Web.UI.DataBindingCollection.RemovedBindings* collection.
Remove(String,Boolean)

Removes the DataBinding object, associated with the specified property name, from the DataBindingCollection collection and controls whether to add the binding to the stem.Web.UI.DataBindingCollection.RemovedBindings* list.

Events summary

Changed

Occurs when the collection of DataBinding objects is changed.

Constructors

  • DataBindingCollection()

    Initializes a new instance of the DataBindingCollection class.

    public DataBindingCollection ();

Properties

  • Count

    Gets the number of DataBinding objects in the DataBindingCollection object.

    public int Count { get; }

    Property Value

    • Int32

      The number of DataBinding objects in the DataBindingCollection.

  • IsReadOnly

    Gets a value indicating whether the DataBindingCollection collection is read-only.

    public bool IsReadOnly { get; }

    Property Value

    • Boolean

      true if the collection is read-only; otherwise, false. The default is false.

  • IsSynchronized

    Gets a value indicating whether the DataBindingCollection collection is synchronized (thread safe).

    public bool IsSynchronized { get; }

    Property Value

    • Boolean

      Always false.

  • Item(String)

    Gets the DataBinding object with the specified property name.

    public System.Web.UI.DataBinding this[string propertyName] { get; }

    Parameters

    • propertyName
      String

      The name of the property to be found.

    Property Value

    • DataBinding

      The DataBinding with the specified property name. If no object with the specified name exists, this value is null.

  • RemovedBindings

    Gets an array of the names of the DataBinding objects removed from the collection.

    public string[] RemovedBindings { get; }

    Property Value

    • String[]

      The array of names of the DataBinding objects removed from the collection.

  • SyncRoot

    Gets an object that can be used to synchronize access to the DataBindingCollection collection.

    public object SyncRoot { get; }

    Property Value

    • System.Object

      The Object to be used to synchronize access to the collection.

Methods

  • Add(DataBinding)

    Adds the specified DataBinding object to the DataBindingCollection collection.

    public void Add (System.Web.UI.DataBinding binding);

    Parameters

    • binding
      DataBinding

      The data-binding object to add to the collection.

  • Clear()

    Removes all DataBinding objects from the DataBindingCollection collection.

    public void Clear ();
  • Contains(String)

    Determines whether the data-binding collection contains a specific DataBinding object.

    public bool Contains (string propertyName);

    Parameters

    • propertyName
      String

      The name of the object to locate in the collection.

    Returns

    • Boolean

      true if the DataBindingCollection contains an element with the specified name; otherwise, false.

  • CopyTo(Array,Int32)

    Copies the DataBindingCollection values to a one-dimensional Array, beginning at the Array object's specified index.

    public void CopyTo (Array array, int index);

    Parameters

    • array
      Array

      The one-dimensional Array that is the destination of the values copied from DataBindingCollection.

    • index
      Int32

      The index in the array, specified by the array parameter, where copying begins.

  • GetEnumerator()

    Returns an enumerator to iterate through the DataBindingCollection object.

    public System.Collections.IEnumerator GetEnumerator ();

    Returns

    • IEnumerator

      An IEnumerator that contains the collection's members.

  • Remove(String)

    Removes the DataBinding object associated with the specified property name from the DataBindingCollection collection and adds it to the stem.Web.UI.DataBindingCollection.RemovedBindings* collection.

    public void Remove (string propertyName);

    Parameters

    • propertyName
      String

      The property name associated with the DataBinding to be removed.

  • Remove(DataBinding)

    Removes the specified DataBinding object from the DataBindingCollection collection and adds it to the stem.Web.UI.DataBindingCollection.RemovedBindings* collection.

    public void Remove (System.Web.UI.DataBinding binding);

    Parameters

    • binding
      DataBinding

      The DataBinding to be removed from the DataBindingCollection.

    Example

    The following code example removes a DataBinding object from the DataBindingCollection collection by using this version of the Remove method and specifying an instance of the DataBinding class, named myDataBinding1. 

                   myDataBindingCollection1.Remove(myDataBinding1);
               dataBindingOutput8=String.Concat("The Count of the collection after DataBinding is removed is  ",myDataBindingCollection1.Count);
               WriteToFile(dataBindingOutput8);

                   myDataBindingCollection1->Remove( myDataBinding1 );
               dataBindingOutput8 = String::Concat( "The Count of the collection after DataBinding is removed is  ", myDataBindingCollection1->Count );
               WriteToFile( dataBindingOutput8 );

                   myDataBindingCollection1.Remove(myDataBinding1)
               dataBindingOutput8 = [String].Concat("The Count of the collection after DataBinding is removed is  ", myDataBindingCollection1.Count)
               WriteToFile(dataBindingOutput8)
  • Remove(String,Boolean)

    Removes the DataBinding object, associated with the specified property name, from the DataBindingCollection collection and controls whether to add the binding to the stem.Web.UI.DataBindingCollection.RemovedBindings* list.

    public void Remove (string propertyName, bool addToRemovedList);

    Parameters

    • propertyName
      String

      The property associated with the DataBinding to be removed.

    • addToRemovedList
      Boolean

      A Boolean value that indicates whether to add the property name to the stem.Web.UI.DataBindingCollection.RemovedBindings* list. true indicates that the propertyName parameter will be added to the stem.Web.UI.DataBindingCollection.RemovedBindings* property, and false indicates that propertyName will not be added to the stem.Web.UI.DataBindingCollection.RemovedBindings* property.

Events

  • Changed

    Occurs when the collection of DataBinding objects is changed.

    public event EventHandler Changed;

    Remarks

    The changed event occurs when the Add method, the Clear method, or the Remove method is called.
